scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client:smoke: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 vite build --minify false
scripts.build:client:smoke:nowrite: cross-env NO_WRITE=true NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 vite build --minify false
scripts.build:client:smoke:debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 vite build --minify false --logLevel debug
scripts.build:client:smoke:debug:log:
sh -c 'mkdir -p tmp; rm -f tmp/build-client-smoke-debug.log; stdbuf -oL -eL cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 vite build --minify false --logLevel debug > tmp/build-client-smoke-debug.log 2>&1; code=$?; echo "
EXIT_CODE=$code" >> tmp/build-client-smoke-debug.log; exit $code'
scripts.build:client:smoke:log:
sh -c 'mkdir -p tmp; rm -f tmp/build-client-smoke.log; stdbuf -oL -eL cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 vite build --minify false --logLevel info > tmp/build-client-smoke.log 2>&1; code=$?; echo "
EXIT_CODE=$code" >> tmp/build-client-smoke.log; exit $code'
scripts.build:client:trace: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 node --trace-uncaught --trace-warnings ./node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js build --minify false --logLevel info
scripts.build:client:debug:log:
sh -c 'mkdir -p tmp; rm -f tmp/build-client-debug.log; stdbuf -oL -eL cross-env DEBUG=vite:* NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 vite build --minify false --debug --logLevel info > tmp/build-client-debug.log 2>&1; code=$?; echo "
EXIT_CODE=$code" >> tmp/build-client-debug.log; exit $code'
scripts.build:client:tail: bash -lc 'mkdir -p tmp; (cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 vite build --minify false --logLevel info) 2>&1 | tail -n 200 > tmp/build-client-tail.log; code=${PIPESTATUS[0]}; echo "EXIT_CODE=$code" >> tmp/build-client-tail.log; exit $code'
scripts.build:client:analyze: cross-env ANALYZE=true NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 vite build
scripts.build:client:analyze:prod: cross-env ANALYZE=true NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 vite build
scripts.build:ci: npm run build:client:prod && npm run build:server
scripts.build:ci:analyze: npm run build:client:analyze:prod && npm run build:server
scripts.build:plesk: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:client:prod && npm run build:server
scripts.typecheck:log:
sh -c 'mkdir -p tmp; rm -f tmp/typecheck.log; stdbuf -oL -eL cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 tsc --pretty false --noEmit > tmp/typecheck.log 2>&1; code=$?; echo "
EXIT_CODE=$code" >> tmp/typecheck.log; exit $code'
